sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import { Step } from "../../"; import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; import styles from "./Steps.module.css"; import InputGroup from 'react-bootstrap/InputGroup'; import FormControl from 'react-bootstrap/FormControl'; export const TwoStep = ({ step, onSubmit, onBack }) => { const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors }, } = useForm(); return (
Кухня {errors.kitchen && "Выберите кухню"} Цена руб. {errors.price && "Укажите стоимость"} Цена со скидкой руб. {errors.discount_price && "Укажите в правильном формате"}
); };
